C

ClientFilter - Class in io.buji.pac4j
This filter retrieves credentials after a user authenticates at the provider to create an ClientToken to finish the authentication process and retrieve the user profile.
ClientFilter() - Constructor for class io.buji.pac4j.ClientFilter
 
ClientPermissionsAuthorizationFilter - Class in io.buji.pac4j.filter
This class specializes the PermissionsAuthorizationFilter to have a login url which is the redirection url to the provider.
ClientPermissionsAuthorizationFilter() - Constructor for class io.buji.pac4j.filter.ClientPermissionsAuthorizationFilter
 
ClientRealm - Class in io.buji.pac4j
This realm implementation is dedicated to authentication.
ClientRealm() - Constructor for class io.buji.pac4j.ClientRealm
 
ClientRolesAuthorizationFilter - Class in io.buji.pac4j.filter
This class specializes the RolesAuthorizationFilter to have a login url which is the redirection url to the provider.
ClientRolesAuthorizationFilter() - Constructor for class io.buji.pac4j.filter.ClientRolesAuthorizationFilter
 
ClientToken - Class in io.buji.pac4j
This class represents a token for an authentication process (client name + credentials + user identifier after authentication).
ClientToken(String, Credentials) - Constructor for class io.buji.pac4j.ClientToken
 
ClientUserFilter - Class in io.buji.pac4j.filter
This class specializes the UserFilter to have a login url which is the redirection url to the provider.
ClientUserFilter() - Constructor for class io.buji.pac4j.filter.ClientUserFilter
 
createToken(ServletRequest, ServletResponse) - Method in class io.buji.pac4j.ClientFilter
The token created for this authentication is a ClientToken containing the credentials received after authentication at the provider.

isAccessAllowed(ServletRequest, ServletResponse, Object) - Method in class io.buji.pac4j.ClientFilter
Returns false to always force authentication (user is never considered authenticated by this filter).

log - Static variable in class io.buji.pac4j.ShiroWebContext
 

N

NoAuthenticationException - Exception in io.buji.pac4j
This exception is thrown when no authentication has been achieved (cancelled at the provider or just check for authentication).
NoAuthenticationException(String) - Constructor for exception io.buji.pac4j.NoAuthenticationException
 

O

onAccessDenied(ServletRequest, ServletResponse) - Method in class io.buji.pac4j.ClientFilter
Execute login by creating token and logging subject with this token.
onLoginFailure(AuthenticationToken, AuthenticationException, ServletRequest, ServletResponse) - Method in class io.buji.pac4j.ClientFilter
If login has failed, redirect user to the error page except if the user is already authenticated, in which case redirect to the default success url.
onLoginSuccess(AuthenticationToken, Subject, ServletRequest, ServletResponse) - Method in class io.buji.pac4j.ClientFilter
If login has been successful, redirect user to the original protected url.
